objects.description: While Norsk Hydro attempted to recover from a [LockerGoga](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0008) infection, most of its 160 manufacturing locations switched to manual (non-IT driven) operations. Manual operations can result in a loss of productivity. (Citation: Kevin Beaumont) (Citation: Hydro)

external_references.description: Kevin Beaumont   How Lockergoga took down Hydro  ransomware used in targeted attacks aimed at big business Retrieved. 2019/10/16
